title: Need Teammates!!
body:
Hey Dudes,
my sister and I want to play in a 5v5 Team to earn the Team Rewards, to have fun with other people and to make nice Teamplays :) (Like Peace Pigeon and his Team Obamacare).
I had a Team, but they aren't playing anymore. So i'm searching for some new Guys. :) 
We don't have a name yet, but we can decide a new one together :)

You can add me if you accomplisht these things (comment and I will get in touch with you):
- You are Lvl 30
- Your sever is EUW
- You can speak English (I can speak German and English)
- You must be at least Silver 3 or higher 
- You need a main Role (alternativly you are good with one/two champs)
- You have to be friendly, of course 
- You must be active on your account
- Your Gender or Age is doesn't matter! :)

A few things to me :)
- I'm playing a bit longer than a Year
- Last season I got to Gold 4
- I'm currently Gold 5 (61 LP)
- My main Roles are Jungle and AD Carry - I also like playing Mid
- My main Champions in these Roles are:
Jungle: {{champion:254}} , {{champion:62}}  and {{champion:80}} 
AD Carry: {{champion:104}} , {{champion:15}}  and {{champion:222}} 
Mid: {{champion:55}} , {{champion:7}} , {{champion:134}} , {{champion:91}}  and {{champion:105}}  (AD and AP)
- My worst lane is Top
- I'm 17 years old and I'm a girl :)

My sister's main Roles are Support (Thresh, Leona, Nami) and Mid (Ahri, Zed and Nidalee)

replies.body:
Hey,
I'm always looking for new teammates and it would be cool to join your team of teammates. ;) I play since season 3 and mained already top, mid and adc. (At the moment adc) I am able to speak englisch but my nativ language is German so I'm more comfortable with that. My current Elo is Silver 3.
Hopefully we can play some games together.
Eragon0102

hey 
last season i was Gold , actually im Plat
I main Top/Adc 
I searching for Team which want to play serious and not leaving after 1 week or if something not right 
Im 17 
AD : Vayne Graves Lucain 
TOP: Irelia Mao J4 Riven Rene

add me pls 
we need a top laner

hey,
i was last leason in Silver3, currently im in Bronze 2.
I main Top and jungle, but i can also play adc when i got a good support,
im 16 years old, im really active and want the team reward too, so i hope u add me :)

hey, sorry my english is very bad, but you say that you can speak german. my name in lol is Serioûs Fishman and i hope that you added me :) im very activ on my acc and my main role is mid and top. i can play supp too but only when i have a great adc. i am 17 years old. i hope we write and play together. see you later :)
